attributes.action: Parental Responsibility...Hold Parents 'Responsible' For Their Child's Actions!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Have parents/legal guardians account for their child's criminal behaviour by charging them for their child's crimes. Thus cutting crime rates overnight. Send every parent in the country information on how to raise children and how to deal with challenging behaviour, also hints and tips on how to communicate with and spend quality time with their child, including, help with organising community based activities for parents and children.
You know it makes sense!
Stop being so soft on crime in this country and get firm on criminals, starting with unruly children.
